title: The Unwilling Mistress
description: Drake Trent wants Mia Jones as his mistress, however the exotic dancer has other plans. She wants nothing to do with the billionaire, but her boss sees a way of using Mia to get to Drake, and his plan involves using her as bait. Mia has to learn who can be trusted as she sets out to help her sister and bring down the evil Jake. But she is soon asking herself if maybe she has misjudged Drake
author: Marie Kelly
